channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danger Mouse
channel.desc: Penfold is assisting Danger Mouse, testing the security system at the British Cheese Museum. Everything is going swimmingly until a temporal glitch strikes and the pair discover the museum's prized pink parmesan has somehow vanished, with a baffled Danger Mouse left cradling the crumbs! There's barely enough time for DM to question what is going on before Danger Hedgehog and Danger Mole arrive on the scene to arrest him.
